column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Glad I was able to finally check out Lou Malnati's Famous deep dish
column2: boy was it scrumptious. Came on a Thursday and it was really packed
column3: waited about 35 mins and was seated and greeted by our server. Server was very busy with the crowds that swarm in at all times
column4: as I was told they are always busy. Â Ambiance is nice and resembles your typical Pizzeria
column5: this place was packed so people watching at that point. We were really starving so decided to order a family salad to hold us over before the Big Kahuna of Deep Dish was to be brought out.
